mapper.select: SELECT count(a.MEMBER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_ROUTINE_MEMBER_APPLICANT a JOIN (SELECT ROUTINE_NUMBER FROM TBL_ROUTINE WHERE ROUTINE_NUMBER = #{routineNumber}) r ON r.ROUTINE_NUMBER = a.ROUTINE_NUMBER
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_routine_member_applicant(ROUTINE_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, ROUTINE_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE) values(#{routineNumber}, #{memberNumber}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(ROUTINE_NUMBER) from tbl_routine_member_applicant where ROUTINE_NUMBER = #{routineNumber} and member_number = #{memberNumber}

select a.ROUTINE_NUMBER, r.routine_title from tbl_routine_member_applicant a JOIN tbl_routine r ON a.routine_number = r.routine_number where member_number = #{memberNumber} AND r.ROUTINE_STATUS_NUMBER = 5
